content.prompt: The passage as a whole primarily advances which of the following claims?

choices.label: Developing a rigorous understanding of an issue often involves questioning the validity of everyday forms of thought.
Traditional philosophical methods are capable of addressing contemporary social problems.
Philosophical insights can be gleaned from many sources, not just from the formal study of philosophy.
Society will need to develop new concepts for different types of intelligence as computers become more advanced.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Identify and describe the overarching thesis of an argument, and any indication it provides of the argument's structure.
